data.summary_suggestion: Send a message to Claude for processing
data.description_suggestion: Sends a message request to Claude for processing and receives a response. Accepts a MessageRequest containing the message content, model selection, system prompts, and optional tools/parameters. Returns a MessageResponse with Claude's generated response, token usage, and stop reason. Supports streaming and non-streaming modes. Requires API key authentication and Anthropic-Version header.

Added context about why this operation is useful (cost estimation, rate limit planning) and authentication requirements to help AI agents understand when to invoke this operation.

data.description_suggestion: Calculates the number of tokens that will be consumed by a message request without actually processing it. Accepts a CountTokensRequest containing messages, model, and optional system/tools parameters. Returns a CountTokensResponse with the total token count. Useful for cost estimation and rate limit planning before sending actual messages. Requires API key authentication.
